name: linter-spell-latex
description: Provider for Atom linter-spell package to enable LaTeX spell checking.
author: Tarn Burton <twburton@gmail.com>

ignoredArgumentCommands.title: Additional Ignored Argument Commands
ignoredArgumentCommands.description: Commands that have a single required argument and one optional argument in which the arguments are ignored.

ignoredEnvironments.title: Additional Ignored Environments
ignoredEnvironments.description: Environments in which to ignore the contents.
